formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Rectangle area: A = L × W Circle area: A = π × (D / 2)^2 Depth conversion to meters: t_m = t × C_u Volume (base): V = A × t_m Allowance factor: f = 1 + α/100 Gross volume: V_g = V × f Mass: m = ρ × V_g Bags: n = ceil( m / m_bag ) Unit conversions used: 1 m³ = 35.3147 ft³ = 1.30795 yd³; 1 ft³ = 0.0283168 m³; 1 kg = 2.20462 lb; 1 metric ton = 1000 kg; 1 US ton = 2000 lb.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
